> Le Blanc:
Mimic (R) :
Mimicked Sigil of Malice AP ratio lowered to .6 from .65
Mimicked Distortion AP Ratio lowered to .9 from .975
> Mimicked  Ethereal Chains AP ratio lowered to .6 from .65

you call that a nerf? Its not that her ratios needs to be nerfed its spell range on her Q and W needs to be lowered

... That's actually a pretty notable nerf for a champ that loses the majority of the time as it is. Her win rate is going to go down the shitter just from the R being nerfed like that, count on it. I don't like it because it doesn't address the problem of her zoning and being incredibly annoying in general, yet it manages to throw her chances to win down the toilet. LB players will feel shafted and those facing her will still feel annoyed.

If her spell ranges get reduced she'd become super worthless. LB needs a rework and likely will have to be converted to a skillshot champ. There's no way she can be both strong enough to have a decent win rate and not perma-banned due to being too annoying if her kit is left as it is.

yup.  Unfortunately, it's not just solo Q that is driving this.  She's also spammed in pro level.  Regardless of her balance state though, the fact is that she lacks counterplay.  She can just double dash in and still do a ton of damage to you.  There's very little you can do to outplay her.
With 800 AP, the most "crippling" of these changes (Mimicked Distortion) looses a grand total of 60 damage, which would be less when you account for an enemy's magic resist.
That's just some stupid tiny compensation nerfs for the loss of DFG, since she now has {{item:3285}} to buy now.

Juking as Morde is fun, but difficult. I love when your pet ghost randomly pops in to save you after walking too far out of leash range. I've had that happen and save me from one skillshot from an enemy LeBlanc, then I was able to kill her with 7 health remaining. I had about 200 health at the start of the fight, and she had about 400.
I've had a LeBlanc miss both chains, kill me anyway, and *still* say "Outplayed".

A {{champion:76}} called me "garbo" (the exact word it said, garbo) when I was playing AD {{champion:105}} top when I had only played it a few times before.

Now I know what you're ready to say "But AD Fizz is OP too!" and I know that. I had played very little of {{champion:105}} (it was only my 5th game with him, around that number) and I wanted to get better with him, because after watching some videos of it, it seemed like fun.

I'll never forget that damn {{champion:76}} insulting me. I have only played a game or two as {{champion:105}} since then.

Fuck {{champion:76}}.

Fuck {{champion:55}}.

Fuck Assassins, just leave me alone.

I understand the pain. My very first game as Vayne I was called garbage. Well no shit, it was my first game on her.

I never forgot that, as you can tell. It was months before I played Vayne again. Vayne is now one of my favorite ADCs, but still.. that shit's cold. There are humans on the other side of the computer, y'know?

The kicker? The one insulting me was playing Nidalee.
